sage.scene.state

Class RenderState

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.state.RenderState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlendState, TextureState, ZBufferState

    public abstract class RenderState
extends java.lang.Object
    RenderState is the base class for deriving subclasses which affect the rendering of a given SceneNode. There exist multiple different types (subclasses) of RenderState; for example, TextureState, ZBufferState, etc. A given SceneNode can have multiple different RenderStates -- but only one of each different subtype (for example, only one TextureState, only one ZBufferState, etc. The set of distinct RenderState types is defined by RenderState.RenderStateType.
    Author:
    John Clevenger, based on a similar class in JMonkeyEngine.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RenderState.RenderStateType
      Enumerates all possible types of RenderStates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void apply()
      This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to apply the render state to the underlying graphics system.
      abstract RenderStateRecord createStateRecord()
      This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to return a RenderStateRecord for the concrete RenderState type.
      abstract RenderState.RenderStateType getRenderStateType()
      This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to return the RenderState.RenderStateType of the subclass instance -- for example, RenderState.RenderStateType.Texture or RenderState.RenderStateType.ZBuffer.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns whether this render state is enabled.
      void setEnabled(boolean value)
      Sets whether this render state is enabled during rendering.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderState

        public RenderState()

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether this render state is enabled. Disabled states are ignored during rendering.
        Returns:
        True if this state is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean value)
        Sets whether this render state is enabled during rendering. Disabled states are ignored during rendering.
        Parameters:
        value - - True if this render state should be enabled; false otherwise

      • getRenderStateType

        public abstract RenderState.RenderStateType getRenderStateType()
        This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to return the RenderState.RenderStateType of the subclass instance -- for example, RenderState.RenderStateType.Texture or RenderState.RenderStateType.ZBuffer.
        Returns:
        A RenderStateType value identifying this render state object.

      • apply

        public abstract void apply()
        This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to apply the render state to the underlying graphics system. It is intended to be invoked by IRenderer implementations, not by game application code.

      • createStateRecord

        public abstract RenderStateRecord createStateRecord()
        This method must be implemented by concrete RenderState classes to return a RenderStateRecord for the concrete RenderState type.
        Returns:
        - a RenderStateRecord for the concrete RenderState type
